textAfterTable: 18 Songs Customer Reviews Great album !           by King koops Some real Chicano rap ! Check out mr.Criminal also ! Biography Genre: Hip-Hop/Rap Years Active: '90s, '00s One of the West Coast's more proven Chicano rappers, Mr. Shadow began his prolific recording career in the late '90s, culminating with 2001's Best of Mr. Shadow. Later that same year, Shadow re-emerged from the barrio with The Mayhem Clique, an album that teamed him with O.G. Sanch, Alt, Seldom... Full Bio Top Albums and Songs by Mr. Shadow 1. Till I Die
